title: Don't Tell The Bride groom breaks silence after wedding was scrapped over major rule break
text:

Don't Tell The Bride is set to air one of the most iconic episodes in its history, as for the first time a couple had their wedding cancelled after the groom broke rules.

Birmingham-based bride-to-be Chanise left wedding planning to fiancé Yanis, who had been busily orgainsing their big day until producers stepped in and decided to pull the plug.

It emerged that the bridal party had been receiving emails to let them know secrets of the wedding.

But worse than that, Yanis and Chanise had broken the biggest rule on the show by keeping in contact.

(Image: Channel 4)

Yanis admitted to Metro : "It's quite legendary. Quite idiotic, but in some ways, I do feel like a legend."

The 23-year-old also claimed that he had his suspicions pretty early on that their days on the programme were numbered.

He revealed he had a "tingling feeling from the offset", as he walked into Chantelle's house - his mother-in-law, and noticed cameras and the amount of people involved.

(Image: Channel 4)

Yaris confessed it was too much for a bridesmaid reveal and said he knew at that point that chances were coming to an end.

He said the executive people and the "higher up" people were there, and it was more than just a reveal - a bigger reveal.

While preparing to unveil his picks for bridesmaid dresses, filming came to a halt when a runner axed the nuptials as soon as the rule-breaking was noticed.

And if things couldn't get worse, the groom had spent almost £12,000 out of the £13,000 budget allocated for the occasion on flights, venue hire and dresses.

(Image: Channel 4)

The 'legend' refused to answer any questions relating to his and Cherise's relationship status, or if they still plan to get married after the ordeal. Poor Chanise broke down on camera after the episode was cancelled.

But after all that happened, he is not embarrassed by the events that occurred, he's proud to have left a lasting legacy.

He said: "It’s something that’s only ever happened once and it’s going to go down in history."
description: Yaris and Charise made history on the show when their wedding was cancelled after they broke a major rule
